results.title: Pee Wee's big adventure
results.creator_credit: Tim Burton, Richard Gilbert Abramson, Robert Shapiro, Aspen Film Society and Warner Bros Pictures
results.brief_description: Pee Wee Herman’s Big Adventure is Tim Burton’s feature film direction debut. It is the surreal tale of Pee Wee Herman, the grown-up kid with impeccable dress sense, and his most prized possession, his awesome bicycle. When Pee Wee discovers it has been stolen from outside Chuck’s Bike-o-rama, he is devastated and embarks on the long journey to find it. He hits the open road and encounters riotous adventures with bikers, bums, cowboys, an escaped con man, a phantom trucker and a waitress who dreams of travelling to Paris. His quest leads him to the Warner Brothers studio in Hollywood where security is tight and Pee Wee’s bike is in the hands of a spoilt child star. He eventually manages to steal it back drawing the interest of a Hollywood producer who makes Pee Wee’s story into a James Bond send-up. The latter includes special appearances by James Brolin, who stars as P.W. Herman and Morgan Fairchild, his assistant and lover. Includes music by Danny Elfman. Cast includes: Pee Wee Herman, Elizabeth Daily, Mark Holton, Diane Salinger and Judd Omen.

results.title: Love and death on Long Island
results.creator_credit: Niche Pictures, Steve Clark-Hall, Christopher Zimmer and Richard Kwietniowski
results.brief_description: Richard Kwietniowski’s ‘Love and death on Long Island’ is a clever reworking of Thomas Mann’s ‘Death in Venice’. Based on Gilbert Adair’s novel, the film stars John Hurt as renowed British author Giles De’Ath, whose secluded existence keeps him out of touch with the rest of the modern world. D’Arth and the 20th century eventually collide when one day he accidentally stumbles into a cinema screening of an American teen film called ‘Hotpants College 2’, starring the latest teen sensation Ronnie Bostock (Jason Priestley). D’Arth instantly becomes obsessed with Ronnie and decides to travel to the actors home in Long Island in the hope that he can meet the object of his desire. Hurt is excellent in his role as the ageing, out of touch author, and in an inspired bit of casting, Priestley’s character resonates with irony, due to his own status as the resident teen idol in the American soapie ‘Beverley Hills 90210’. Cast also includes Sheila Hancock, Fiona Loewi, Maury Chaykin, Gawn Grainger, Elizabeth Quinn (Awards: 1998 New York Film Critics Circle Awards for Best First Film)

results.title: Alice, sweet Alice = Holy terror = Communion
results.brief_description: Alice is quite unlike other girls her age. Instead of playing with friends, she loses herself in a distorted secret world, populated by satanic rituals and occult masks. Alice is fiercely jealous of the favouritism her parents show towards her younger sister, Karen, a sibling jealousy that verges on demonic. When Alice’s sister and aunt are mysteriously murdered, Alice’s parents question the depths of their daughter’s evil intent. As the family self destructs, a priest and the police believe there are stronger forces involved and are intent on uncovering the unholy truth embodied in a seemingly normal Alice. Brooke Shields makes a brief, 10 minute appearance. Cast includes Linda Miller, Mildred Clinton, Paula Shepherd and Niles McMaster.

results.title: The Opposite of sex
results.creator_credit: Don Roos, Michael Besman, David Kirkpatrick and Rysher Entertainment
results.brief_description: Christina Ricci stars as 16 year old Dedee Truitt, a teenage Lolita with a caustic tongue and scrupulous libido. ‘The Opposite of Sex’ opens with Dedee running away from her white trash mother to go and stay with her well to do gay half brother Bill (Martin Donovan), and his hunky not too bright boyfriend, Randy (William Lee Scott). Soon enough the malicious vamp has turned everyones life upside down, taking off with her brothers boyfriend and his dead ex-lovers ashes. Writer and director Don Roos has fashioned a sharp witty film which inventively uses Dedee’s voice over narration to plead her case to the audience and to confound our expectations of what she might possibly be thinking next. Ricci is wonderfully droll and jaded in the title role but not to be undone is Lisa Kudrow as the bitter and suspicious sister of Bill’s dead lover. Cast also includes Lyle Lovett, Ivan Sergei, Johnny Galecki

results.title: The River wild
results.creator_credit: Curtis Hanson, Lawrence Turman, David Foster, Turman-Foster Company and Universal Pictures
results.brief_description: Meryl Street is Gail, a former rafting instructor, returning to her old river with her husband and son for her son’s birthday, and to try and salvage what is left of her marriage. On the river they meet Wade (Kevin Bacon) and Terry, two fellow rafters on their way to Bridle Creek. Halfway down the river Gail discovers Wade and Terry abandoned by their guide and offers to lead them the rest of the way. This harmless act puts all their lives in danger as Wade and Terry reveal their true, evil selves. To save her family, Gail must face her own fears and run the Gauntlet - the most dangerous of all the rapids on the river.

results.title: The Fallen idol. The Winslow boy
results.creator_credit: Oswald Hafenrichter, Graham Greene, Carol Reed, G Turney-Smith, Terence Rattigan, Anthony Asquith, Anatole de Grunwald and London Film Productions
results.brief_description:
Based on a true incident, ‘The Winslow Boy’ (produced by Anatole de Grunwald, directed by Anthony Asquith) tells the simple story of a father’s impassioned fight to clear the name of his son - a young naval cadet expelled from college after being found guilty of theft. Arthur Winslow is certain of his son’s innocence, and yet is impeded in his task to retain the boy’s honour, that is until a famous KC and political leader, Sir Robert Morton, agree to help their cause. Cast includes Robert Donat, Cedric Hardwicke and Margaret Leighton.
Based on a short story by Graham Greene, ‘The Fallen idol’ (produced and directed by Carol Reed) is a sensitive study of the way in which a young boy interprets the strange and seemingly illogical behaviour of the adults who surround him. He witnesses the adulterous relationship that develops between the butler Baines, whom he worships, and a typist at the foreign embassy in London where his father works. He also sees Baines’ wife fall to her death while spying on the couple and the boy’s interpretation of events places Baines in a perilous situation. Cast includes Michele Morgan, Ralph Richardson, Sonia Dresdel and Jack Hawkins.

results.title: The Inspector general = Happy times
results.creator_credit: Henry Koster, Jerry Wald and Warner Bros Pictures
results.brief_description: An assistant elixir salesman (Danny Kaye) is mistaken by the Russian villagers of Brodny as the infamous Inspector General - an envoy of Napoleon. The tale’s comic impetus is driven by bungling officials seeking to appease the false general and the tongue twisting talents of the inimitable Danny Kaye. Cast includes Danny Kaye, Walter Slezak, Barbara Bates and Elsa Lanchester. Freely adapted from Nikolai Gogol’s classic Russian story.

results.title: Mackenna's gold
results.creator_credit: J Thompson, Dimitri Tiomkin, Carl Foreman and Columbia Pictures
results.brief_description: A dying Indian entrusts sherrif Mackenna (Gregory Peck) with a map of the legendary Valley of Gold. After memorising the contents of the map Mackenna destroys it, thus placing himself in a precarious position of being a target to the local bandit gang as well as the townspeople. The two parties are united by a greed for gold and a fear of the common enemy, the Apaches. The gold in the canyon belongs to the Apaches and it has been decreed by Apache Gods that the gold remain untouched. Both those who are hunting the gold, and the Apaches who are protecting it have their own reasons behind desiring its possession, leading to a violent climax. Cast includes Gregory Peck, Omar Sharif, Telly Savalas, Burgess Meredith and Edward G Robinson. Also included on the tape are original theatrical trailers and behind the scenes information.

results.title: They came to Cordura
results.creator_credit: Robert Rossen, William Goetz and Columbia Pictures
results.brief_description: Set during a Mexican expedition in 1916, Gary Cooper is cast as a self doubting Army Major, who believing himself to be a coward, relieves himself of his combat duties and is assigned the inglorious task of locating five battle heroes and ensuring their safe passage to the Cordura military base. The five heroes are worthy of a medal of honour, something that appeals to the “cowardly” Army Major. The mission is going along smoothly until the arrival of an American woman accused of treason (Rita Hayworth), as the film evolves into an intense study of character and endurance. Cast also includes Van Heflin and Tab Hunter.

results.title: Billy Madison
results.creator_credit: Tamara Davis, Robert Simonds and Universal Pictures
results.brief_description: Billy Madison’s future is made, or so he thought. He is heir to his father’s fortune, he’s passed high school compliments of his father’s cheque book, and he spends his days lazing by the pool, drinking and chasing women. His world is thrown into chaos when his father informs him of plans to hand over the family fortune, the Fortune 500 company, to vice president, and resident weasel, Eric Gordon. Billy makes a bet with his father to regain what is rightfully his. The bet is that Billy will go back to school and pass every year level within 24 weeks. Working against him is Eric, determined to retain the company, while working for him is an attractive teacher whose very interested in her new student. Cast includes Adam Sandler, Bradley Whitford, Darren McGavin and Bridgette Wilson.
